SO IM A PLAYER OF COUNTER STRIKE FOR LIKE ABOUT 10 YEARS OR SO AND PLAYING CS IS FUN AND ACTUALLY YOU CAN WORK ON REFLEXES AND KNOWLEDGE ABOUT GUNS OR SO, FIRST I WAS PLAYING CS 1.6 THE GAME WAS AWESOME BUT THEN CHEATERS STARTED TO COME UP AND THE GAME NOW IS FULL OF CHEATERS AND I STOPPED PLAYING CS SINCE THEN.YEARS LATER COUNTER STRIKE GLOBAL OFFENSIVE CAME OUT AND I STARTED PLAYING IT AND IT WAS AWESOME MY MAX RANK WAS LEGENDARY EAGLE I COULDN'T GO FURTHER CAUSE THERE WERE MANY PLAYERS THAT WERE BETTER THAN ME...NOTHING SPECIAL.AND NOW I STARTED TO PLAY AGAIN CS:GO AND THIS GAME IS JUST FILLED WITH CHEATERS IN EVERY GAME I'VE PLAYED THERE MUST BE 3+ CHEATERS IN THE ENEMY TEAM WHO SHOOTS THROUGH WALLS ,SPINBOT,BUNNY HOP ETC. STEAM SAID THAT THE GAME WOULD BE BETTER WITH THE ,,NEW" TRUST FACTOR SO THEY MADE IT FREE AND THE GAME HAVE BEGUN TO BE A PILE OF SHIT WITH CHEATERS ALL OVER THE PLACE WHICH YOU CAN'T PLAY ONE I MEAN ONE FAIR GAME WITHOUT CHEATERS EVEN YOU HAVE CHEATERS IN YOUR TEAM DOESN'T MATTER THERE ARE ALWAYS CHEATERS CAN YOU DO SOMETHING WITH THIS GAME CAUSE YOU SPEND MONEY AND TIME FOR SHIT BUT NOT ON THE ACTUAL THINGS THAT MATTERS JUST FIX THE GAME MAKE A BETTER AND RELIABLE ANTI CHEAT WHICH SCANS YOUR GAME FOR CHEATS AND OVERLAY APPS WHO MIGHT BE CONNECTED WITH CS:GO. AND IN THE MOMENT THAT THIS GAME IS FILLED WITH HACKERS I DON'T RECOMMEND IT TO OTHER NEWCOMERS OR PLAYERS THAT WANTS TO PLAY CS:GO COMPETITIVELY. PLEASE FIX THE GAME AND MAKE IT AS IT WAS BEFORE
